removeResource(int, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerWarehouse
Method removeResource removes a resource from a position in the warehouse and returns the removed Resource (the position is set as null)
removeResources(Map<Resource, Integer>) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.StatusPlayer
this method removes resources: the priority is to remove resources from the warehouse, then from the leader cards, then from the strongbox (it's the most favorable strategy for the player) PRECONDITION: before you call this method you have to be sure that the player owns the resources you want to remove
removeResourcesMap(Map<Resource, Integer>, Map<Resource, Integer>) - Static method in enum class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Resource
this static method removes a map of resources from another map (map1-map2).

removeStrongboxResource(Resource) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.StatusPlayer
you give to this method a resource, and it remove one resource of that type from the strongbox.
removeTwoLeaderCards(int, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.StatusPlayer
It removes two leader cards from the leader card list, you have to pass the indexes of the card you want to remove.
